name: Soft Chocolate Cookies
author: Frankie
summary: Your family will find these chocolate cake-like cookies irresistible!
ingredients: ¼ cup confectioner's sugar, for dusting  (Optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat butter, white sugar, and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth
Beat in one egg until completely incorporated; beat in last egg along with vanilla extract
Combine flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Stir flour mixture into butter mixture until just incorporated; mix in chocolate chips
Roll dough into 2-inch balls, or drop spoonfuls of dough 2 inches apart, onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake in preheated oven until edges of cookies are firm, 10 to 12 minutes
Dust warm cookies with confectioners' sugar, if desired
